snippet: The Range Rover Sport is a smaller and less expensive offshoot of the flagship Range Rover, itself redesigned for 2013. Compared with the previous Sport, the 2014 model is lighter and has a lower roofline,
abstract: Range Rover Sport is smaller and less expensive offshoot of the flagship Range Rover and is popular in urban settings, particularly New York City; 2014 model is lighter and has a lower roofline compared to previous Sport.
